entry.title: Web Development for Intermediate- React.js
entry.content:
Intermediate

Jquery.js vs React.js

React.js

It is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

Before starting to build a React web app:

  1. Install Node.js DownloadLink. Node.js is sharable js.Package. You can reuse the code from other coder through npm install the package.

  2. Run the following cmd in visual studio terminal.

Start to make your first React-app

  1. Input the following cmd in your terminal:

Example File Structure of React app

  1. After you have downloaded the node.js, run the cmd below in terminal.
  1. You have created your first React app.

Javascript – ES6

ES6 is the new Javascript language. It make code more easier to look and manage.

Var, Const and Let

Var and let are both used for variable declaration in javascript but the difference between them is that var is function scoped and let is block scoped. Yet Const is fixed variable. (From Google)

CAUTION: Const is no allow user modify variable. But let and var is able to modify after the variable was declare.

Let variable:

Const variable

Destructing

Template String

Function

Symbol

Arrow

entry.title: Web Development for Very Beginner
entry.content:
Website and Internet

Before starting to program, you may wonder what relationship between Server and Client.

We are the client to get the information through web browser. But behind that, we are requesting information from server. The requesting process may go through several route. Internet Backbone

You can try to trace the route with using cmd and input the following cmd.

Small Basic Website

A small basic website from youtube.How To Make A Website Using HTML CSS And JavaScript Step By Step In 20 minutes

You can debugging or modify element with open the HTML in your browser like Chrome or Firebox. After that, press ‘CTRL+Shift+I’ to open the developer tool. The details at Chrome devloper tool in 8 minutes ++

Before Program a Website

Before you start to program a website, Web development Roadmap

Next,you have to install an IDE and extension to cut short your developing time.

Ide

Offline IDE
Visual Studio Code
Sublime

Online IDE
Codepen
JsFiddle

Useful Extension for Visual Studio Code

15 Best Visual Studio Code Extensions For Web Development

Shortcut to Code Faster in Visual Studio Code

Emmet Cheat Sheet
21 Vscode shortcut-Especially 19 to 21

Website Programming Language

You have to know what is HTML, CSS and Javascript to develop a basic website.

HTML is to provide a basic structure of website. CSS is to formatting and decorate the website. Yet JS is to make website functionality and interated with user.

Learn Html in 10 minute

Open your IDE, and input ! then press ‘tab’. Lastly, open in ‘live server’ How do set up live server in Vscode?. Your first web page was created. It preview at your default browser.

Html Cheatsheet

CSS

CSS Crash Course In 30 Minutes

CSS Cheat Sheet

Javascript

JS is more like the backend languages. Example : Python, Java or C#. It included variable, control structure, array and other. The difference is the syntax.

JS Cheat Sheet-Beginner
JS-Intermediate

Jquery crash course in 30 minutes

Jquery Cheetsheet

Interative Jquery Cheat Sheet

entry.title: Video Tut_ Project Ecommerce using Django Part 1
entry.content:
Video Tutorial Link :Youtube Link

Github link : ori whole code

Django Template File : template file

Project Configuration

Project Set Up

  1. Clone these from these https://github.com/justdjango/django_project_boilerplate and https://mdbootstrap.com/freebies/jquery/e-commerce/ in visual studio

  2. Run pip install virtualenv at the cloned folder.

    • Then runvenv env and env\scripts\activate
    • Will come out Python virtual environment console.
    • You can install Python library and or run Python cmd in this environment.

  3. django cmd

    • python manage.py runserver is to deploy webpage on browser.
    • python manage.py createsuperuser for manage the admin panel.
    • python manage.py + makemigrations or migrate cmd are use after doing modification in models.py.

  4. Sample Django forlder structure:

  • Sub app folder(url,view,admin,model).py
    • app. Difference app can integrated with main app.
  • Main app folder > setting >Installed app: >url
    • main app
  • static folder
    • Have to modify static folder url in setting for execute js,css in static folder.
  • template (html)
    • This folder is to store .html files
    • Inheritance of html. Base html and other html
    • It has like {extends 'base.html'} or {include '.html'}
    • extends (Inherited whole compnent)
    • includes (insert other component)
    • It also has {load xx}. It function like import

  1. Files nside Django main app and sub app:

    • url. (for link)
    • view (return object to template)
    • model (for database modification)
    • admin (It has related to the model and it for register database into admin panel also)

  2. Move folders (static folders) from mdbootstrap to static folder. Move all html files from mbdbootstrap to templates folder.

  3. You can play it around with make some changes at every html files.

Integrated the sub app and main app

Put following code under:

Display home.html

Authendication Function

  1. Authendication function
    -Import alluath
    • https://django-allauth.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html
    • Follow instrcution from link above.

Display item from Database at .html

Flow of built up a database and display it in webpage:

  • Item database (inventory or stock)

  • The following code block is demostrate the flow.

Order Summary

Display the order summary page

Create an order summary table

Remove and add single item from cart
